E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 2/14/1991
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
C Joseph Heatherly, MR Lee Mosqueda
in return for
LF Blake Kyle.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Capital City GM

Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Roger Garon



Date: Saturday, 5/24/1991
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Joshua Scott



Date: Tuesday, 6/3/1991
Subject: Progress of Asdrubal Martinez
Dear Sir,

He has an ERA of 1.66, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
